    public class AddTask
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
implements android.view.View.OnClickListener, IAddTask, android.app.DatePickerDialog.OnDateSetListener, android.app.TimePickerDialog.OnTimeSetListener
    The screen where user adds a task to server. It handles the user name input, password input, due date input, and due time input. It also sets a reminder on the device when due date and due time is set and the task is added to the server.
